browseLabel: Click {0} button to select a game
detectedRenpyDesc:
This tool may not be suitable for Ren'Py versions of some games and may break your game.

Don't forget to back up the game!

If you encounter an error, please let me know.
lockTranslation: Lock the game to this translation.
forceRegenerateTranslation: Force regenerate translation files. (Adds only missing translations.)
translateWithGoogle: Translate with Google Translate (Experimental and may extend completion time).
logfileEndDescription: You can find this log file in "{0}" later.
decompileRpycSuccessAndFail: Decompilation of {0} file(s) successful, but decompilation of {0} file(s) failed
decompilingRpycCompleted: Decompiling RPYC files completed. Removing temp files...
translationSkipped: Generation of translation files skipped, because the translation folder already exists and force regeneration is disabled.
translatingSkipped: Translation of "{0}" skipped. Because it's already translated!
connectingGoogleTrans: Connecting with Google Translate. Depending on the length of the dialogues in the file, this may take some time...
translatingSuccess: Translation completed! Please launch the game and check if there are any errors.
lookingExistedLockFile: Looking for an existing lock file.
lockFileFoundLoc:
Lock file found in "{0}" and removed.
Creating a new one...
lockFileNotFound: Lock file not found, creating a new one...
lockFileCreated: Language locked to {0} ({1}). To unlock, simply delete the "{2}" file.
lockFileFailed:
Could not create translation lock file.

{0}
languageSettingsDesc: Add this code to "screen preferences():" in screens.rpy. Replace "English" with the original language of the game.
googleTransCanNotBeEmpty: Google translate language cannot be empty.
languageFolderNameInvalid: Language folder name should be at least 3 characters and contain only lowercase English characters.
cancellingTranslation: Cancelling translation. It may take a while depending on background processes...
zipStarted: Started generating a zip archive in "{0}"...
optimizeTexts: Optimize texts except dialogues for translation. (Experimental)
